original: “Bhante nāgasena, aṭṭhime puggalā mantiyamānā mantitaṁ atthaṁ byāpādenti.
analyzed: bhante nāgasena aṭṭhime puggalāḥ mantiyamānāḥ mantitam attham byāpādenti

original: Rāgacarito dosacarito mohacarito mānacarito luddho alaso ekacintī bāloti.
analyzed: rāga caritaḥ dosa caritaḥ moha caritaḥ māna caritaḥ luddhaḥ alasaḥ eka cintī bālaḥ iti

original: Ime aṭṭha puggalā mantitaṁ atthaṁ byāpādentī”ti.
analyzed: ime aṭṭha puggalāḥ mantitam attham byāpādenti iti

original: “Rāgacarito, bhante nāgasena, rāgavasena mantitaṁ atthaṁ byāpādeti, dosacarito dosavasena
analyzed: rāga caritaḥ bhante nāgasena rāga vasena mantitam attham byāpādeti dosa caritaḥ dosa vasena

original: mantitaṁ atthaṁ byāpādeti, mohacarito mohavasena mantitaṁ atthaṁ byāpādeti, mānacarito
analyzed: mantitam attham byāpāda iti moha caritaḥ moha vasena mantitam attham byāpāda iti māna caritaḥ

original: mānavasena mantitaṁ atthaṁ byāpādeti, luddho lobhavasena mantitaṁ atthaṁ byāpādeti,
analyzed: māna vasena mantitam attham byāpādeti luddhaḥ lobha vasena mantitam attham byāpādeti

original: alaso alasatāya mantitaṁ atthaṁ byāpādeti, ekacintī ekacintitāya mantitaṁ atthaṁ
analyzed: alasaḥ alasatāya mantitam attham byāpāda iti eka cintī eka cintitāya mantitam attha

original: byāpādeti, bālo bālatāya mantitaṁ atthaṁ byāpādeti.
analyzed: byāpāda iti bālaḥ bāla tāya mantitam attham byāpāda iti
